intro.signup.label: Social login
teamingCriteria.title: Teaming Criteria
teamingCriteria.vi: Teaming criteria for visually impaired runners
teamingCriteria.content.1: - All runners will be organized into teams based on their personal records.
teamingCriteria.content.2: - For subsequent event participation, you will participate and partner within your assigned team.
teamingCriteria.content.3: - The teaming criteria for visually impaired runners and guides are as follows.
signup.form.info.title: Enter your basic information
signup.form.info.id.label: Please enter a ID
signup.form.info.id.check.success: This is an available ID. Do you want to use it?
signup.form.info.id.check.failed: This ID is already in use. Please enter a different username.
signup.form.info.email.label: Please enter your email
signup.form.info.name: Name
signup.form.info.name.label: Please enter your name
signup.form.info.tel.label: Please enter your phone number
signup.form.running.title: Running spec
signup.form.running.record.label: Record
signup.form.running.detail.label: Please fill out the detail record
signup.form.running.location.label: Please write down where you usually run
signup.form.running.guide.experience: Guide experience for visually impaired runners
signup.form.running.guide.experience.vi: Name of the blind runner you ran with
If you don't remember, please write 'don't remember'
signup.form.running.guide.experience.pac: Please write down the 1km pace of your partner runner at the time
signup.form.running.guide.experience.cou: Please list the number and duration of your guide run
signup.form.running.way: How you heard about the program
signup.form.running.way.guide.1: Via social media or media (Instagram, etc.)
signup.form.running.way.guide.2: Through acquaintances, such as clubs, running crews, etc.
signup.form.running.way.guide.3: By seeing a guided run at a marathon or training location
signup.form.running.way.guide.4: Listen to Kim Seung-hyun's guided running training
signup.form.running.way.vi.1: Because I am a VMK member
signup.form.running.way.vi.2: Because a non-VMK club or acquaintance recommended it
signup.form.running.reason: Please share how you decided to participate
signup.form.running.reason.label: Please feel free to share what made you decide to participate
signup.form.running.group: Run groups you can join as a guide runner
signup.form.running.group.label: Based on 10km
signup.form.running.group.medium: {group} visually impaired runners with {minutes1} to {minutes2} minutes
signup.form.running.group.last: {group} visually impaired runners with no history
signup.form.running.request.label: Please feel free to tell us anything else you'd like us to know about your participation in the program
signup.intro.title: Sign up
signup.complete.title: Signup complete
signup.terms.privacy.title: Agreement to provide and utilize personal information
signup.terms.privacy.1:
1. Purpose of collecting and utilizing personal information: 
Used to conduct the program, such as sending informational SMS to participants and matching for other events.
signup.terms.privacy.2:
2. Personal information items to be collected: 
Personal information (name, gender, age, cell phone number, residence, history, guided running experience, SNS, KakaoTalk ID)
signup.terms.privacy.3:
3. Period of retention and use of personal information: 
From the time of service subscription to the time of guidance
signup.terms.privacy.4: 4. Please understand that you will not be able to participate in the program if you refuse to consent.
signup.terms.likeness.title: Consent to utilize likeness rights
signup.terms.likeness.1:
1. Purpose of collection utilization and provision: 
Promotion through SNS upload and promotion through other channels
signup.terms.likeness.2:
2. Period of retention and use of portrait rights: 
Until deletion of the promoted post
signup.terms.likeness.3:
3. Secondary use of portrait rights: 
 Production and posting of online and offline promotional materials.
signup.terms.likeness.4: 4. You have the right to refuse to consent to the use of your likeness, and if you do, you will be excluded or mosaicked from the creation of educational promotional materials.
signup.terms.likeness.5: 5. Editing and nomination of your work will be done without infringing on your personality.
